The three weeks at Leaders Academy were amazing! Their curriculum teaches English in every aspects such as grammar, writing, listening and reading. Especially, their reading program was great. If I live near there, I would put my kids to there every week:)
And I was impressed by warm and considerate attitude of the teachers.
And weekely feedback on children was helpful to understand what they have been doing there. I was greatful to see the willingness to help the children in every way.

I am very pleased with my son's first experience at Leaders through his winter camp. I was worried since my son does not enjoy learning English that much but I had hoped that this camp would provide an opportunity for him to experience that English could be fun too. Leaders delivered on such promise and for that I am greateful. Everyone at Leaders, including even the staff was  very engaging with students and the principal always had such energetic vibe which was reassuring to see because I could tell that she really liked kids. My son seemed to enjoy being exposed to using English at Leaders. I am definitely willing to come back here if possible!

I am thrilled to share my positive experience with Leaders Academy. From the moment I stepped into the academy, I was impressed by the warm and welcoming atmosphere. The academy's well-designed classrooms, state-of-the-art technology, and well-stocked resources create a conducive learning environment.

One of the standout features of Leaders Academy is their exceptional team of teachers. They are not only highly qualified but also passionate about teaching English. They go the extra mile to ensure that every student receives personalized attention, and their teaching methods are engaging and interactive.

The curriculum at Leaders Academy is comprehensive and well-structured, covering all aspects of English language learning, including grammar, vocabulary, reading, writing, listening, and speaking. The academy also offers various levels of courses, catering to learners of different proficiency levels, from beginners to advanced learners. This ensures that students are placed in the appropriate level based on their skills and progress at their own pace.

The academy's focus on practical English skills is particularly beneficial. The teachers emphasize real-life communication skills, such as speaking confidently in different situations, understanding different accents, and writing effectively in different formats.

Moreover, the academy's administrative staff is friendly, helpful, and efficient. They are always ready to assist with any queries or concerns, and the registration process is smooth and hassle-free.

In conclusion, I highly recommend Leaders Academy to anyone looking to improve their English skills. The academy offers an excellent learning environment, outstanding teachers, comprehensive curriculum, and ample opportunities for practice.

Leaders Academy's library has an extensive selection of books, from classics to contemporaries. The reading program helps students to build their overall English fluency, especially when combined with English classes (Vocabulary, Grammar, Writing and Reading).

It's also good that each students have personalized approach and materials to really suit what they need in improving their English.
